string.text: Is this your lab, is there a girl here??

Theres no girl here, that Im certain of. I am just a simple Ecologist, my speciality is butterflies and flowers. I dont know much about chemical formulae and complicated experiments. I help out the best I can, but Im not much help here
What is this, a huge brain? What kind of creature did this come from????
It's the brain of a controller. Maples has managed to grow it and now uses it for a generator of energy. He is a genius, a bit strange but all great scientists are like that
And what kind of experiments is this this genius conducting here?

I'm not precisely sure, I think he is trying to make new artefacts and studies there affects on organisms. Listen, you were able disconnect the teleport. This means that you must know another smart scientist. Can you convince him to come here and help Maples? I'm tired of getting bitched at
I do Know of one, but he is recovering from an illness. I will talk to Maples first and then see if my friend wants to join your team
I will wait your return
Oh, my, your a sight for sore eyes! I can feel my heart thumping! Its your lucky day sweet heart, Ive come to join your crew. My experience should be obvious

You feel your heart thumping? Are you sure its not just your lice moving around? You look like you have not washed in a month. It looks like rats have been nesting in your hair, oh, wait, they are!!!. However, down to business. We are recruiting and I have noticed your Signet ring. So it's time to see if you have half a brain, like the rest of us!
But wait a second I...

But! Tis' something under the tails of horses! Time is already ticking away on your first verification. The next fifteen minutes will determine if there is a brain in your head that matchs your ability to move your back-end
What? fifteen minutes? You think your Bob Barker or something??.

You must find a Phone in this Laboratory within fifteen minutes. Since your already wasting time I will give you a hint, the phone lies in a backpack. There are several backpacks in the Lab. Only don't search the bottom levels of the Lab, it's not there. So get moving and use your head. It takes brains to join this crew, POINDEXTER!
A woman wants me to find her phone, this will be much easier than working for Chimera
My Lioness, here's your phone. Perhaps you should write down your number for me

The last time I gave my number to a man, he was dead. I wrote it on his cold naked heels with a black marker. Alright, you have executed the first task. Your dirty face is starting to look pleasent to me
I'm flattered. I think your two bodyguards are already getting jealous

That's not jealousy, you retrobate! They feel sorry for you. Here's a reward, go on, take a smoke break, a swig of vodka. By the way, one of my guards needs a favor from you. He is retiring from the Zone soon, give him the respect that a Master deserves. Talk with him
I couldn't find the phone in time. Now I am threatened with execution?
No execution, just a slow death from stupidity! No phone means no reward
Do I still have a chance?
There is always a chance. Are you four years old,or just very blissfull? zip up your pants already! Take a short break and speak with one of my guards. He is leaving the Zone soon and needs a favor
Greetings Master, so soon you will fly out of here, eh? I thought the only retirement here was a permanent one!

Yes, seems like it! Both of us have put in our time and we have enough money to live the high life in Miami! But I'm worried about our Chief, she is tough but still young and naive. She needs somebody to watch her back when we leave. There's too many lowlifes ready to betray their own mother for a small amount of money!
I hate treacherous people myself. If the need arises, I will come to her aid

That's good to hear. I have a request to make of you, I want to take a souvenier to America from the Zone. At the Army warehouse they have a stuffed psuedodog. Its located somewhere in Lukash's HQ. Could you grab it for me on your travels? But dont make it a priority
I will get it for you. How you get it into America is another problem

Here are the coordinates of a transition from Warlab to the base of Freedom. A tunnel leads from this lab to the entrance of a collapsed tunnel at the Freedom base. Once again I repeat, dont hurry up and do this task. Later Panther will have another task that will take you to the Freedom base, so wait and kill two birds with one stone
Thanks, for the advice. I will look in Lukash's HQ for a stuffed animal for you. Only problem is Freedom like to shoot Mercenaries
I have brought your stuffed animal, this will be quite a conversation piece in Miami, got some fleas though
Excellent! I will show the Americans a real monster
A stuffed Chimera would have been a better choice in my opinion
The Chimera is a good choice, but would maybe scare the ladies too much, Hah
Im ready for the next task
You carried out the first task easily. The second will be slightly more difficult, I'm not sure if you are up to it. You are more like an Orangutan in a survival suit, than a Mercenary
My sweet naive Panther, You can't see what's in front of you. By myself I could deliver a heap of trouble to you and your number of standing invalids in Exoskeletons. Now what is the task?

So, I See that your mind has small dimensions, therefore I will explain in detail: data has arrived that soldiers from the Kuznetsova Sqaud (which guards the bridge in the Cordon) have come into possession of some vital information. This intel will be arriving by messenger, which should be intercepted. You understand?
What is this messenger carrying? Lipstick and a Pocket Mirror? A manicure set?

You make jokes, well funny man it's time to see how good you really are. This next mission you will find more difficult. The messenger is transporting a disk that contains information on every Mercenary base in the Zone! Without question, this clearly threatens us. The disk should be taken away from the soldier, but don't kill him. We have our hands full fighting off the Monolithians at the moment, so we don't want any military reprisals. The plan is this: you go to the Cordon, you get on the destroyed bridge (I will send a picture to your PDA) and you wait. The messenger will be arriving from the north, so pay attention. I warn you, if you fail this task I will take away your ring and your money. If you execute the plan succesfully then you gain my recognition and the fee in the for of sixty Slantings
This will require some thinking, but I can handle it
I'm to take a disk from the enemy without killing? I can't do it, not my nature
Greetings, my Princess. I Have brought the disk without killing the messenger
This is remarkable. I have a vague feeling that your not so stupid after all. Here is your fee, you earned it. Is that cologne I smell?
Well, a blind dog pissed on my leg, or it might be the Chimera crap I stepped in. As a bonus, how about a kiss on the cheek?
Your about the three hundreth guy to hit on me in the Zone. For now have a rest, there will be one more task for you
Greetings. I have brought the disk

You don't need to say it, I can tell something went wrong. I promised to take away your ring. For the first time I will change the rules, you can keep it. But you have disappointed me, so I will take away money for moral indemnification
I understand. Can I do something to make up for it?
There will be another chance for you to change my mind
You have something else for me, my kitten?
Don't fool yourself, I'm no kitten. Let's be honest with each other now. I have some questions to ask and this is for your ears only
I've been wanting to speak to you alone. But seriously I have questions, speaking in confidence
I will share information with you, just between us
You have something else for me, my kitten?
Don't fool yourself, I'm no kitten. Let's be honest with each other now. I have some questions to ask and this is for your ears only
I've been wanting to speak to you alone. But seriously I have questions, speaking in confidence
I will share information with you, just between us
About what is it you wanted to ask?

You know the Zone is no place for women. I agree with that, but need has forced me to come here. I am not here for the money. I have more important things to worry about than expensive houses. I could tell when we first met that you were no rookie, and certainly not a Merc. You wouldn't happen to go by the name of the Marked One?
Yea, I'm not a mercenary. The Task for me is to find out where the daughter of a boss from O-consciousness is located

I've heard of this girl, but she is not here. Mercenaries also search for her, the reward for finding this girl is great. Only, as far as I know, she is not the daughter of anyone from O-consciousness. There is something else going on here. What exactly that is, I don't know. But, what I do know is she is being held captive. It's not the Mercenaries who have her. Who they are and where she is held I don't know
Interesting information, but this doesn't bring me any closer to finding her. What is on the top floor of the Laboratory? The entrance there is blocked by a teleport

I dont have access to that part of the facility. I dont know where a key is located either. I do know that two important scientists work up there. One of them I've been told is from O-consciousness. They work in secret and are guarded day and night. Only my boss knows what goes on up there. If you consider the recent attack by the Monolithians, these scientists must be up to something serious. Well, now it's your turn to share information
What is it you want to know?
It's too early to tell you why, but I'm searching for three pieces of the Monolith

There are three? I know only of one, and I know where it is. I don't have any information on where the other two are but together we can find out. So now that you know who I am, are you going to give me another task? I heard it's necessary to pay Lukash a visit?

This is great news! I agree, together we will find the other two pieces. I will keep your true identity a secret. I would do anything for those Monolith pieces! He, he, within limits of course. Now, about your next task. The boss demands that you steal a backpack that is stored in the Freedom base armory. The task is simple, but will positively affect your reputation. Bring everything from the backpack. I will loan you an Invisible Exoskeleton to make things easier for you
I brought everything from the backpack. I hope my trial period is now finished?
There was one more task, but it's been postponed. There has been something going on while you were gone. There's been a lot of questions about you, I think someone has blown your cover
Who? did you tell anyone about me?

I promise it was not me, you know I need your help finding those pieces of the Monolith. Take my advice Marked One, leave now and quickly. Damn! I just got a message the boss has already arrived. Your going to have to speak with him. Keep your gun in readiness, I won't be able to help you. There he is, behind you, speak with him
You wanted to see me?
I think your a fraud! I have reliable information that your responsible for our recent setbacks!
Who has been spewing such nonsense?

A source that has cooperated with us for a long time. The Marksman, you know that name? Give me the Signet ring of the Mercenaries, otherwise I will take it away by force and simply remove it from your corpse!

Your a piece of goat shit to think you can make demands of me! You have not given it to me and you will not to take it away. If your a Merc then act like one! Or it will be your corpse that gets looted!
You had a choice and you have made it. Farewell scum!.
Why did you get involved, I thought you worked for them?

Be silent. It is not necessary to ask questions. I have my own problems that are no burden of yours. For my men, dont worry, tomorrow they will remove their armor and leave the Zone, they are long time veterans and have earned a new life. Help them to finish off any Mercs left in the Laboratory. And then I'll leave. And For me, don't worry, I will find you when the time is right
Thanks for the help. I will return the favor. I must travel to the Bar now and meet a comrade
Goodbye Marked One, Go, I don't love farewell scenes. And obviously someone close to you has sold you out! I wanted to give you a small farewell gift
Thanks for the help
Thank the Panther. We are fanatics but loyal. We have not had this much fun in a long time. One good last fight for our memories!
I didn't expect to see you guys fight the boss!

The boss became chicken-shit, I've wanted to shoot him myself for a longtime. Farewell Marked One, we will not see each other again. Here's for the memories, it's quite good. Look after the Panther or we will return and find you! Ha! A Joke
Hello

At once a question, how was it possible to disconnect my teleport? For it's deactivation only two people can make the device. And since recent time the only one is myself. But I didn't give it to you. Excuse me, I have forgotten to introduce myself, Doctor Klyonov. Earlier I was engaged in research of the Zone as a part of a group of scientists of O-consciousness. Likely, about such youv'e already heard. But, since recent time, in connection with obvious disagreements with the management of this group, I started to work alone. Truth is every day I risk being killed by the people from this group

The Key to the teleport was given to me by a stalker, but I know a person who can make a similar one. And what is it you do here that needs to be kept secret? I will tell you that I seek two things, the missing girl of one of the leaders of "O-consciousness" interesting that you have just mentioned this group of scientists, and artefacts under the name of the Heart of the poltergeist or also known by another name, the Monolith piece

I after all, know you, your Marked One, and in recent times I've witnessed one curious conversation with one of my former colleagues. Explanations about what I am engaged here, won't make sense to you. I will simply tell you, I investigate artefacts and conduct experiments for their artificial creation. I will answer the other question: The missing 'daughter' of the representative of O-consciousness is not here, but the girl really exists. She managed to gain the trust of the scientists. I will tell to you she is simply a naive child. Most likely a simple victim of someone's secret game. But the girl and the artefact have gone missing. On your piece of the Monolith, I will reveal to you a small secret. If you still have not remembered, in your PDA the task 'to Kill Strelok' is not an error, your true purpose was to return to O-consciousness this piece of the Monolith which you have, well at least had, but you know where it is. And on the key for the teleport, you deceive me, that scientist, you call Victor, was killed!

Doctor, your data is really invaluable. And that scientist is alive, he's ill but very much alive, he became translucent and now his name is Golograma, better know as Hologram. I Hope he will recover. Do you know the location of the other parts of the Monolith? I have data that it's not one, but three

Actually, the Heart of the poltergeist is singular. If you assert that theres three then you've heard about the recipe. If you connect three pieces of the Monolith, it is possible to create the Mega-Absolute that has abilities you can only dream of! All is not so difficult, it is only necessary to have in stock two of the Heart of the Poltergeist and the artefact that the daughter of the representative of O-consciousness has taken. The trouble is that the second Hearts of the poltergeist does not exist. I have attempted to create it artificially. And you spoke of Victor, he's alive? That's good luck!!! It changes the situation a little. With his abilities my experiment will go much faster, and his ailment probably holds the key to recreating the second Heart of the Poltergeist. Can you assist me in this research? I will give you a reward of the first Heart of the Poltergeist I create
What do you want me to do?

I have divided your task into two parts. They are not difficult, considering your recent history. I will tell you only about the first: Without Victor I cannot continue the experiment. Try to persuade him to work with me. The troubles between us in the past were not my fault, It was the managment that used us. To work with my present assistant is simply impossible, he's lazy and an ignoramus!!!\nAgree?
I agree, I will help you
Doctor, I'm not a truce envoy. To me it's unimportant to persuade Hologram
Here, I have brought your assistant. What is still required?

Fantastic!!! The second part of the task is simple. To try to make an artificial Heart of the poltergeist, bring me the original and ten Cobblestone artefacts. Where to find the original? I don't know, but it is assured that you will find it
Fantastically simple task!

Yes, don't forget about the Cobblestones. They are necessary for the work! To cheer you up, I will tell you something. All Laboratories of the Zone were once connected to each other by a network of tunnels. And so I will show you one more transition to this Lab. It begins behind a door at the bottom level of laboratory X-18, you have probably already visited there. On your map I have left a mark
I Have brought everything that you asked. Take the Cobblestones
This is excellent. Today we will begin the experiment. I hope we have everything we need. Truth is, I dont know how much time it will take to produce a result
Your not sure?!! I hope you don't ruin my artefact?
Don't worry, even with a negative result your artefact will not suffer. When there are results from our experiments, I will inform you
While you work, I have other tasks that require my attention
I See the treatment has done you good
Yes, I have recovered! And now I am able to give treatment to the men. I Wanted to thank you for the help. I hope Cyclops has given you a tip-off on a cache?
Yes, I will find out about the cache. What are your plans now? I have an offer from Doctor Maples
Maples? He still works? So, that means you have visited that Laboratory. I don't want to work for either the Mercenaries, or the Monolith
In Warlab the Monolith and the Mercenaries have been wiped out. The Freedom Faction has set up a base there. Maples is trying to make an artificial artefact, say's without you she can't do it.
Okay, I will assist in this experiment. Im not a good fighter so I will need to be escorted to the Army Warehouse transition
I will escort you to the transition then..
I just need escorting to the transition. From there I can get to the lab by myself, I know a shortcut
We made it. Here's the path to the warehouses
Thanks Marked One, don't worry, I will be okay on my own from here. You meanwhile, need to look for the cache that Cyclops spoke about. We will meet again in Warlab
Farewell for now

For a reward I want to share with you information. I don't know whether it is important to you or not, in this region is one more cave and the entrance there is closed by a teleport. I made a key for this teleport. One month ago I sold it to a stalker. I don't know his name, but I know that he is neutral. A second key to this teleport is impossible to make, only the original will work. The action of this key is delayed. It won't unlock immediately, it takes several hours. Here take this pair of stones I found on the path, for me they are useless, but I know that they will be useful to you
Greetings Cyclops. I see the medicine already operates
Yes, Vitkas has already recovered, and it is obvious that some of us need much more treament. It would be easier to be in a coffin, but I have hope. I have another cache for you
As always with a riddle?

Well, it's free only for babes! Listen:
the Cache is on a tree near to that,
Where the service was born once by the sentry.
Nearby the car empty costs
On rails coming to an end
And the district all there dazzles with hills,
Where the Geiger counter squeals mad
Again I play the role of doctor Watson! Thanks, I will take a look. I will talk to the Hologram, he has gotten prettier with the fight-coloring of Indians stuck on his forehead!
We will meet again, Marked One
Greetings, do you have any new info?
We have reconnoitered a little, but nothing new yet. How are you?
I have a sea of Information. I have found the girl, not the missing one, the Panther
What? Another woman??? Was she also lost?

At first I thought she was a Merc boss. But she had other reasons for being there, I'm not sure what though. She did try to warn me about my cover being blown and helped me fight the Mercs who came to kill me. It wasn't possible for me to get past the teleport though
Sounds like she saved your ass. We really need to find a way inside that Lab
There was no key present and I don't know where to get one. I will try to find out. By the way, where is the Astrologer?

He is in the Cordon. You will need to go and see him and deliver the copy of my map. We will stay here a little longer. But first, you need to return the Signet ring to Lukash, and collect your reward. We will scout for paths to new territories and two other things. We will try to find the location of the girl and also the identity of the person who informed the Merc boss about you. From me to you a small gift, a useful blade. It is of more use to you. I here have recently killed a Samurai, Ha! Joke, I will be in touch by PDA
You made it
I will have a little rest first, then it will be possible to start work. Go and talk to Maples
Well I hope you are able to help with the experiment
I Hope so, we will meet again
Greetings, you looking for me?
Mmm, yes, It's easier to stop a flesh at full charge during mating season than to catch up with you in the Zone! Have you brought the map?
Yes I've brought it. Fang has told me to give it to you. Listen, about the missing girl, have you heard anything?
Heard! How could I not have heard. Everybody is searching for her, for different reasons
Do you have a plan?

I will stay here another day, it's necessary for me to study the map. I will leave for new territories and I will look for the girl there. I need you to track down and destroy a little man for me. The name of this little man is the Panther. Can you do that for me?.
Listen, I am not an asassin. It is possible to track down, but to kill? I will think about my decision. For now, I SHOULD VISIT Sidorovich -.
Fang, listen, have you already checked up on a path to Limansk? Zahara, by the way, sends you his greetings. I don't think he knows your here at the Bar
Yes, we checked up on this track, it works. I would have told you earlier, but I had not found a return path yet. I will go see Zahara and pass the evening emptying a bottle with him
It would have been a disaster if I was stuck there, but I do have some business there
I still have other news
What else did you find out?
The Pilgrim and I have checked up on one more path to the Red Forest. I need you to go there for a task
To the Red Forest? What kind of business could we have there?

There is information that a group of hunters has found some documents in the Red Wood. We need to get them. You after all have already had dealings with hunters. While you'r there reconniter the area. You will find the hunters easily, I will put a mark on your map. You can take care of your business in Limansk while you are there, up to you really. Communication will be as usual, through PDA. I will remain here in the Bar, the Pilgrim will go and reconnoiter a path into the Lost Village
Well, how was it in captivity?

I thought I was a goner! God was merciful. Listen, once again you have helped me. I will, absolutely free of charge, share with you some information. All the same, you would learn it sooner or later, but let me be the first who tells you about it
What kind of info? I hope it's not weather reports from South America
This is something really good. Near to the bunker of Sidorovich, there is a transition. It's a path to the Marsh. Nobody from the rookies knows about it, I have noted it on your map
Greetings, are you the guy doing busimess with Sidorovich?

Yea, thats me. He is supposed to pay me 70,000ru for some rare artefacts I brought him. I was coming to pick up the cash but there's too many soldiers today. He said he would send a trusted Stalker to pay me
I'm the Stalker he was talking about, he sent me an SMS to meet you here. Here's your money
Oh thank you friend. I thought Sidorovich had forgotten about me! Well, now I can leave the Zone tonight
Sidorovich, I have satisfied your request. Give me my money and interest
Whats wrong, are you sick in the head? What money, what percent?
You sent me a SMS to pay a stalker cash and that you would reimburse me with interest

So, this means your the latest victim. Recently a couple of hackers have appeared in the Zone. They send fake SMS's from dealers to rip off unsuspecting stalkers. Dont feel bad, your not the first to fall for it
Shit! I will go and put a bullet into his forehead

Calm down, he is long ways away by now. Here, I will give this to you as indemnification. A pair of first-aid sets and an Artefact Detector. Now stop sniveling and go find some artefacts to replace your cash
Greetings Pilgrim, I see you decided to grow back the beard. Whats going on here with that portal
A group of special troops has ambushed the village. They have set a trap for anybody coming into the territory. There is no way out
When they come to capture us I will kill them all

No!, these are not regular soldiers, such as in the Cordon. These are elite troops who have billeted here. Their mission is the physical elimination of all living beings in this chosen square of the Zone. There's been fighting in the village, a group of stalkers have withdrawn to a former shop. I think they are trapped
You must be exaggerating, things can't be that bad here

You don't trust me? The bulk of the special troops are on a raid in the next village. That maybe gives us another day to live. We will still be stuck in here when they return. We can't get out, try for yourself!
Damn! So why didn't you warn me?
I did send a warning, I told Fang that I was in a trap. He has badly missunderstood what the situation really is
Are you Special Forces? Is this a trick?.

I am a neutral. I have come to help my brother, he sent a message that he was caught in an ambush. I got the key off a guard we killed outside. I can see that my brother is not here. Alright, I will search further, I know this village
Pilgrim just told me a group of stalkers were taking refuge in the former shop. However, I don't know where the shop is
I know where it is. I see you are armed well and look experienced with weapons. I will be in your debt if you will help us
Of course I will help, we wouldn't have got out of this trap if you didn't arrive
Well then, let's not waste time. The shop is located at the edge of the village. When we get to the road go at once to the right
I Sympathize with your loss. We were not in time. I hope you have other relatives?
I have a Sister. But thank God she is not in the Zone. Though she is a fighter like me. Her nickname always seemed to fit her personality, the Panther
What???? And how old would she be? Has it been a long time since you last saw her?
She is still young, just recently turned twentysix. It's been over a year since I saw her

If I am not mistaken, I think your sister is here in the Zone. I know her, but I don't know where she is at present. She was in good health last time I saw her. But it seems many people are starting to take interest in her. I could try to arrange a meeting for you

She is in the Zone??? Are you sure you'r not mistaken? Please help me find her. And still I have another request: we need to eliminate the military staff that has set up a HQ in the central house on the hill. There should not be very many of them. They need to be taught a lesson, they just can't go around killing innocent people. I only have a few men so your help is required. After that we will have a conversation
Looks like they were planing to stay awhile

I have picked up a PDA of a Lieutenant, I will send a message to their commander and tell him his men now rot in hell! Take the Pilgrim and survey the village, see if any soldiers remain. When you get my message, comeback for your gift
This should be interesting
Everythings clear in the village
Were there any problems?
Light resistance from a couple of Spetsnaz zombies, yea monsters

Well, thanks for your help. Try to find my sister if you can. I hope these is not a big attack before you return. Leave the pilgrim, if you can, he will be useful. About your reward, it looks like you already have better weapons than what I could give you. Therefore I will give you information about transition coordinates from this village to Limansk
Greetings, I have brought your sister
A huge thanks to you. I will have a serious talk with her about why she is in the Zone!
No thanks is necessary. What's the situation with the military, have they returned?

You have arrived just in time. We have been monitoring their communications and they are on there way to attack the village with a formidable air assault force. We require your help if we are to stand a chance against these bastards. Please take Panther into the cellar, the entrance is in the middle of the courtyard in front of this building. She will be safe there from the fighting. After that, choose a position for defence
I don't think they will be returning here. They don't have anyone left
I think your right. Many lives have been lost, but even more have been saved

I will Talk to Pilgrim and have him remain here to help protect Panther. Meanwhile, I will travel to Warlab, I have business to take care of there. I have found the PDA of their captain. They knew your sister would be here and were planning to wipe out the entire village

I will examine the information on the PDA and let you know if I find any further data. I wonder why they are so interested in my sister? And once again I thank you, here take these coordinates for a transition from the Village to the Hospital
This is quite a hiding place you found. By the way, do you have any brothers?

Coming here was necessary. There have been several attempts on my life, someone is obviously hunting for me. I miss my two body guards. Yes, I do have two brothers. I have not seen them for over a year. Has there been any progress in finding the artefacts?

I managed to meet a scientist who wants to try and make a copy of the Heart of the Poltergeist. But I have some more important news. First the bad news: It seems that you have only one brother now. One has been killed! Both of them have been working in the Zone. Kolmogor is alive and waits for you in the Lost Village. He was very surprised to learn that you were in the Zone

Kolmogor is my older brother. And my younger, is no more. I will cry! But not now, later! For now we must go to the Lost Village and see my brother. I hope it will be quieter there. You know, recently, I have been receiving some strange SMS messages from someone trying to set up a meeting. They hinted that if I refused, they would kill my brothers. The meeting dead line just passed the day before yesterday. I thought it was just a hoax, but now I know it was real

SMS? Extremely strange. From the data I found on your younger brother, nobody could even know you were related. Though recently I have ceased to be surprised by the turn of events. Someone has extensive communication access throughout the Zone, and this someone is obviously an enemy. Alright, we will go to the village. Then I will untangle this ball of riddles. Better for you to wait there. I have been sent an approximate location of a transition from the Marshes directly to the Village. I hope it's not hard to find: you remain here, and I will reconnoiter ahead. If all is clear, I will send you a signal
Hello swamp dweller, are we spawning mutants to create chaos? I search for a path towards the Lost Village. My comrade has given this area as an aproximate place to find the transition
Greetings stalker, sometimes spawning creatures keeps the other artefact hunters away from this part of the swamp. There is a path but it's not at this spot
Can you tell me where it is?
